desc: Millionaire Grind humbly started in Memphis, TN as a clothing brand in Ernest Field's mother's garage in 2012. Now, Millionaire Grind serves thousands of clients and businesses nationwide with a variety of custom services including: Screen Printing, Embroidery, Photography, Videography, Podcasting & Studio Recording.

layout.text: From graphic design to screen print, photography to video production (and more), we've got you covered.
